name: AJAY PRAJAPATHI
profileSummary: A passionate and dedicated fresher MERN stack developer with strong skills in React.js, Node.js, MongoDB, and Redux. Experienced in building responsive web applications and implementing RESTful APIs. Proficient in version control with Git, having worked on collaborative projects through GitHub. Developed various projects such as hospital management systems, e-commerce platforms, and inventory applications, showcasing both frontend and backend development capabilities. Eager to contribute to innovative teams and apply my skills to real-world web development challenges.

education.name: BTech
education.Institution: Brilliant Institute Of Engineering and Technology

projects.name: Hospital Management (Well care Hospital)
projects.detail: Developed a comprehensive hospital management system using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js). This application enhances the experience for both patients and doctors by streamlining appointment scheduling, patient records management, and communication. Collaborated with a team of three members using Git for version control and project management.
